Tasks

The main task is to create either a bot or mini-app over HOT Protocol SDK

Participating teams must develop a prototype software (prototype) within a limited time. Applications must be unique and useful for HOT users.

FAQ

Find answers to some of the most common questions

What are the criteria for judging the mini-apps or bots created during the hackathon?

  • Idea: 0-10
  • Quality of implementation: 0-10
  • Number of HOT APIs used: 0-10
  • Availability of the on chain part (signing transactions): 0-5
  • Design (for web app): 0-5

Can I participate in the hackathon individually, or do I need a team?

Yes, you can participate individually.

Is there any prerequisite knowledge required to participate in the hackathon?

From the software engineering perspective: JS, Rust. Also good to know some NEAR documentation. Also here is the video from our dev that can help: https://youtu.be/_i7rYHWIQ4Q
